name: Orb_SEQ
description:
ORB_SEQ

*Chrome recommended for browser play*


Prepare to battle.

A rhythm game inspired by DDR/BeatMania in which you play as an orb that is pit against the forces of the evil triangles. AS part of the prophecy, you must work your way up the leader-boards and take on more and more difficult songs. At the moment there are 10 unique songs from cameos such as: magician.io, Karma Kollective, and 9thHourFilmsGames.

Keys

Up, Left, Down, and Right arrows. Keys are rebind-able in settings menu.

Calibration

You can calibrate your audio delay using the calibrator in the main menu. When you are listening to the song, close your eyes and press the [UP] key everytime you hear a kick drum.

Music

magician.io : https://soundcloud.com/a79hn93oj2ww
karma-kollective: https://flopunlimited.bandcamp.com/album/shorehouse-sensations

Thank you for playing!
